content: drops 161-34 drops design pattern no fa-301 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- sizes us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 9½/10½ eu 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot length 22 - 24 - 27 cm / 8¾ -9½ -10½ leg length 20 - 21 - 22 cm / 8 -8 1/4 -8 3/4 materials drops fabel from garnstudio 100-100-100 g color no 100 off white and use drops delight from garnstudio 50-50-50 g color no 04 light blue drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 5 - or size needed to get 26 sts x 34 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
